histogram.name: Cros.CrOSActionRecorderEvent
histogram.summary: This histogram is emitted each time when CrOSAction is recorded by the CrOSActionRecorder. For each CrOSAction multiple values can be emitted, corresponding to different events happened during the action processing by CrOSActionRecorder.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.ArchiveType
histogram.summary: The type of archive file that Chrome OS cros-disks daemon is requested to mount.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.DeviceMediaType
histogram.summary: The media type of removable device that Chrome OS cros-disks daemon is requested to mount.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.FilesystemType
histogram.summary: The type of file system that Chrome OS cros-disks daemon is requested to mount.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Fuse.Archivemount
histogram.obsolete: Deprecated 10/2021. This feature (using the older archivemount program instead of newer fuse-archive) was never enabled-by-default, although some people opted into the chrome://flags/#files-archivemount flag anyway.
histogram.summary: The error code returned by the archivemount program, which is called every time a user opens various archive files in ChromeOS Files App.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Fuse.FuseArchive
histogram.summary: The error code returned by the fuse-archive program, which is called every time a user opens various archive files in ChromeOS Files App.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Fuse.FuseZip
histogram.summary: The error code returned by ZIP mounting program fuse-zip, which is called every time a user opens a ZIP archive in ChromeOS Files App.

histogram.name: CrosDisks.Fuse.Rar2fs
histogram.summary: The error code returned by RAR mounting program rar2fs, which is called every time a user opens a RAR archive in ChromeOS Files App.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.FormatCompletedError
histogram.summary: The error code of disk format signals received from the Chrome OS cros-disks daemon.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.FormatTime
histogram.summary: Time taken for the Chrome OS cros-disks daemon to perform a format operation.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.MountCompletedError
histogram.summary: The error code of disk mount signals received from the Chrome OS cros-disks daemon.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.MountErrorMountType
histogram.summary: The {mount type}x{mount error code} received from the Chrome OS cros-disks daemon.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.MountTime
histogram.summary: Time taken by the Chrome OS cros-disks daemon to perform a Mount operation.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.UnmountError
histogram.summary: The error code of disk unmount operations returned from the Chrome OS cros-disks daemon.

histogram.name: CrosDisksClient.UnmountTime
histogram.summary: Time taken by the Chrome OS cros-disks daemon to perform an Unmount operation.

histogram.name: CrosFirstRun.DialogShown
histogram.obsolete: Deprecated 01/2020 in Issue 1001460 when Welcome Tour was deleted.
histogram.summary: Records the number of times when first-run dialog was shown.

histogram.name: CrosFirstRun.FurthestStep
histogram.obsolete: Deprecated 01/2020 in Issue 1001460 when Welcome Tour was deleted.
histogram.summary: Index of furthest step that was reached during tutorial. Since order of steps could change eventially and new steps could apear we use index here instead of step name.

histogram.name: CrosFirstRun.TimeSpent
histogram.obsolete: Deprecated 01/2020 in Issue 1001460 when Welcome Tour was deleted.
histogram.summary: The total time that user spent on first-run tutorial.

histogram.name: CrosFirstRun.TimeSpentOnStep
histogram.obsolete: Deprecated 01/2020 in Issue 1001460 when Welcome Tour was deleted.
histogram.summary: The time that user spent on some step of tutorial.

histogram.name: CrosFirstRun.TutorialCompletion
histogram.obsolete: Deprecated 01/2020 in Issue 1001460 when Welcome Tour was deleted.
histogram.summary: Tracks the way how user left tutorial.

histogram.name: CrosFirstRun.TutorialLaunched
histogram.obsolete: Deprecated 01/2020 in Issue 1001460 when Welcome Tour was deleted.
histogram.summary: Records the number of times when first-run tutorial has been launched.

histogram.name: CrosUsb.NotificationClosed
histogram.obsolete: Removed 01/2021. We haven't been making use of this.
histogram.summary: Records the reason why the "Cros USB device detected" notification was dismissed. Recorded on notificiation close, after usb attached.
